name: Bring Forth the Lord of Knives

system.description:
This Animae Magic spell conjures a slender faerie made of black iron with rusted squeaky joints and long knives for fingers. The menacing creature has a Faerie Might of 10. Brought forth only when Patronus has need of a bodyguard, the Lord of Knives defends its master viciously and to its own destruction.
See the nearby insert for this faerie’s statistics.
Created through transient magic, although the Lord of Knives has its own Might Score, Patronus’ Penetration total on conjuring this faerie needs to beat the Magic Resistance of this faerie’s opponents if it is to do them harm. That being the case, it is most useful against unprotected mundanes.
